abstract.original_text: The presented heuristic is based on the exponential growth of the data collected Journal Pre-proof J o u r n a l P r e -p r o o f 4 WWK, MAM, WP, AW-D, PFZ, DS, TA, AHZ, MD, AND JM by WHO situation reports for days 31 to 57. As pointed out in [4] the predictability could be improved by pairwise comparisons based on abductive reasoning [5]. Abduction is frequently used in diagnostic expert systems. The abductive reasoning (or inference) process was used for this study.
